Afterword: It took quite a while for this chapter to come out and it looks like we won't get a new chapter again next month unless there are some changes.
Sorry if the summaries are longer now. At this point, anything can be relevant so I don't want to skip too much details. Also, this is the Chinese upload so I had to wait for the Japanese one so I can read. Hope ya'll don't mind if I post this comment again once the Japanese one is uploaded here.

(3/3) Yay for stickers. But sensei gotta punish her for coming to work braless. Can't spank her now so he punishes her by tying her hands up and making her admit that she likes hard sex play. Then he did this weird play thing where he left her alone tied and naked in the car. The rest is sex and her peeing when she came cuz she been holding back that one for a while. They arrived home with chef boy outside. Apparently they're neighbors. Before going inside, she gave sensei a flashdrive containing the photoshoot data for sensei to feast on at home. She walks away with chef boy and they're talking about the nutrient drink again. Big sus butt touch here, but sensei believes in her. When sensei got home, he did not feast on Karin's pics, but looked up Houra's AV instead. He decides to not tell Karin about the AV thing... but this made Sensei sus of the company they're working with. TBC.

(2/3) This ain't quite exactly about marriage but rather gravure models use screen names and she wanted to use sensei's surname. This is just a small talk but the point is, she now goes with Rinka Nonami as her gravure name. Sensei then asks her what happened in the fitting room with Cman. She says that she was done changing when he came in and he just taught her how to pose that's why she was breathing heavily when she came out. He was a little touchy but she thinks it was part of the job. Still, Sensei insists that she should say No to that. This led into an argument but she made it clear that she has no eyes for any other man except Sensei. With an embarrassed face, Sensei asked why she even like him in the first place. Apparently, she really liked this painting that Sensei made wondering what kind of person the artist is. So she went her way to learn more about him. She eventually fell in love with him and here we are. This activated Sensei's switch and so the car sex begins.

Summary: (1/3) Chapter starts with Karin in the middle of her first shoot. Everything seems to be going well that even Sensei wants a copy of this shoot's data for his own use. Houra pointed out that Karin's ass is a little reddish ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°). Anyway, Karin goes to change her clothes when Mr. Cameraman (Cman) also went in there. This surprised Sensei but it's nothing out of ordinary here apparently. Houra asks him what he thinks of (Karin's) gravure modelling, but with his mind being preoccupied of Karin and Cman, he mistook the question and talked about Houra's gravure modelling instead. This made her embarrassed, she then casually revealed that she didn't just do gravure but also did AV. Sensei was yet again shocked but soon after, the two in the fitting room came out with Karin looking a little flustered. SUS. On to the next scene, Sensei's driving Karin home. She talks about how she wanted to be Karin Suma (Suma is sensei's surname).

This is only looking worse and worse... time to blacklist this artist so I don't have to worry about it lol

Also from a purely logical perspective there are too many threats for nothing to go wrong. The studio shes modeling for is gonna make her do porn, and that sketchy guy who lives with her making her some drink all the time? Thats beyond a red flag. That drink could be sperm, aphrodisiac, stimulants, drugs that knock you out or make you forget, etc. Plus the girl is really sweet but also way to naive and stupid; any man will be able to make her do what he wants if he pressures her enough. This is a time bomb.

For context in his last story (rarefure) there was no NTR involving the Main FMC or even the Secondary FMC, until literally after chapter 20. Until that point it was all romance with a bit of drama, then a huge amount of Ntr and a total loss of logic, then more ntr and a lot of drama, and then a happyish end with the MC and Main FMC together ----- so I would expect something similar from this, but dont expect to see it coming since youll be 20 chapters into the story thinking its all okay and then bam ntr, be warned.

I think it'll save us all some pain if we just assume right now theres going to be NTR in this. This is what this author does, he writes wholesome manga length love stories, stays vanilla for so long you think it's safe (10+chapters), then blasts the story full of NTR for another 10 chapters, before trying to tie it all back together with a "happy" ending. The Ntr is almost guaranteed, what we should hope for instesd is that he puts the MC and FMC happy together again as an exclusive couple at the end.
